Verses: 1 purajaadhiyaarum Dhevavasanaththai Etrukkondaargalendru Yoodheyaavilirukkira Apposthalarum Sagodhararum Kelvippattaargal.
2 pedhuru Erusalemukkuth Thirumbivandhabodhu, Viruththasedhanamullavargal Avanai Nokki:
3 viruththasedhanamillaadha Manusharidaththil Neer Poi, Avargalode Pojanampannineer Endru, Avanode Vaakkuvaadhampanninaargal.
4 adharkup Pedhuru Kaariyaththai Mudhalilirundhu Varisaiyaai Avargalukku Vivarikkaththodangi:

5 naan Yoppaa Pattanaththil Jebampannikkondirundhabodhu Gnaanadhirushtiyadaindhu, Oru Tharisanaththaikkanden; Adhennavendraal, Naalumunaigalum Kattappatta Periya Thuppattiyaippola Oru Koodu Vaanaththilirundhu Ennidaththil Irangivandhadhu.
6 adhile Naan Utruppaarththuk Gavanikkirabodhu, Boomiyilulla Naalukaal Jeevangalaiyum, Kaattumirugangalaiyum, Oorum Piraanigalaiyum, Aagaayaththupparavaigalaiyum Kanden.
7 allaamalum: Pedhuruve, Ezhundhiru, Adiththup Pusi Endru Ennudane Sollugira Saththaththaiyum Ketten.
8 adharku Naan: Aandavare, Appadiyalla, Theettum Asuththamumaayirukkira Yaadhondrum Orukkaalum En Vaaikkulle Ponadhillai Endren.
9 irandaandharamum Vaanaththilirundhu Saththam Undaagi: Dhevan Suththamaakkinavaigalai Nee Theettaaga Ennaadheyendru Marumozhi Sollitru.
10 ippadi Moondrudharam Sambaviththapinbu, Ellaam Vaanaththirkuth Thirumba Eduththukkollappattadhu.
11 udane Sesariyaavilirundhu Ennidaththirku Anuppappatta Moondru Manushar Naan Irundha Veettukkumunne Vandhu Nindraargal.

12 naan Ondrukkum Sandhegappadaamal Avargalodekoodap Pogumpadi Aaviyaanavar Enakkuk Kattalaiyittaar. Sagodhararaagiya Indha Aaruperum Ennodekooda Vandhaargal; Andha Manushanudaiya Veettukkul Piravesiththom.
13 avano Than Veettile Oru Dhevadhoodhan Nirkiradhaik Kandadhaagavum, Yoppaa Pattanaththilirukkira Pedhuru Endru Maruperkonda Seemonai Azhaikkumpadikku Manusharai Avvidaththirku Anuppu;
14 neeyum Un Veettaaranaivarum Ratchikkappaduvadharkedhuvaana Vaarththaigalai Avan Unakkuch Solluvaan Endru Andhath Thoodhan Thanakkuch Sonnadhaagavum Engalukku Ariviththaan.
15 naan Pesaththodanginabodhu, Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Aadhiyile Nammel Iranginadhupolave, Avargalmelum Iranginaar.
16 yovaan Jalaththinaale Gnaanasnaanankoduththaan, Neengalo Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Gnaanasnaanam Peruveergal Endru Karththar Sonna Vaarththaiyai Appozhudhu Ninaivukoorndhen.

17 aadhalaal Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvai Visuvaasiththirukkira Namakku Dhevan Varaththai Anukkiragampanninadhupola Avargalukkum Andha Varaththaiye Anukkiragampanniyirukkumbodhu Dhevanaith Thadukkiradharku Naan Emmaaththiram Endraan.
18 ivaigalai Avargal Kettapozhudhu Amarndhirundhu: Appadiyaanaal Jeevanukkedhuvaana Mananthirumbudhalai Dhevan Purajaadhiyaarukkum Arulichseydhaar Endru Solli, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththinaargal.

19 sthevaan Nimiththamaai Ezhumbina Ubaththiravaththinaale Sidharappattavargal Suvisesha Vasanaththai Yoodhargalukkeyandri Matra Oruvarukkum Ariviyaamal, Penikkenaatu, Seeppuru Theevu, Andhiyogiyaa Pattanamvaraikkum Sutriththirindhaargal.
20 avargalil Seeppurutheevaarum Sirene Pattanaththaarumaagiya Silar Andhiyogiyaa Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Girekkarudane Pesik Karththaraagiya Yesuvaikkuriththup Pirasangiththaargal.
21 karththarudaiya Karam Avargalode Irundhadhu; Anega Janangal Visuvaasigalaagi, Karththaridaththil Thirumbinaargal.
22 erusalemilulla Sabaiyaar Indhak Kaariyangalaikkuriththuk Kelvippattabodhu, Andhiyogiyaavaraikkum Pogumpadikkup Barnabaavai Anuppinaargal.
23 avan Poich Serndhu, Devanudaiya Kirubaiyaik Kandabodhu, Sandhoshappattu, Karththaridaththil Mananirnayamaai Nilaiththirukkumpadi Ellaarukkum Buththisonnaan.
24 avan Nallavanum, Parisuththa Aaviyinaalum Visuvaasaththinaalum Niraindhavanumaayirundhaan; Anega Janangal Karththaridamaaich Serkkappattaargal.
25 pinbu Barnabaa Savulaith Thedumpadi, Tharsuvukkup Purappattuppoi, Avanaikkandu, Andhiyogiyaavukku Azhaiththukkonduvandhaan.
26 avargal Oru Varushakaalamaaich Sabaiyode Koodiyirundhu, Anega Janangalukku Ubadhesampanninaargal. Mudhalmudhal Andhiyogiyaavile Seeshargalukkuk Kiristhavargal Engira Per Vazhangitru.
27 annaatkalile Erusalemilirundhu Sila Theerkkadharisigal Andhiyogiyaavukku Vandhaargal.
28 avargalil Oruvanaagiya Agabu Enbavan Ezhundhu, Ulagamengum Kodiyapanjam Undaagum Endru Aaviyaanavaraale Ariviththaan; Adhu Appadiye Kilavudhiyu Raayanudaiya Naatkalile Undaayitru.
29 appozhudhu Seesharil Avaravar Thangal Thangal Thiraanikkuththakkadhaaga Yoodheyaavil Kudiyirukkira Sagodhararukku Udhaviyaagap Pananj Segariththu Anuppavendumendru Theermaanampanninaargal.
30 appadiye Avargal Segariththu, Barnabaa Savul Enbavargaludaiya Kaiyile Koduththu, Moopparidaththirku Anuppinaargal.
